articles.title: Zac Efron on “Jarring” Transformation for ‘The Iron Claw’: “I Did Not Look Anything Like Me” - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The star plays professional wrestler Kevin Von Erich, as he said getting the support of with his real-life counterpart "feels incredibly gratifying, more so than anything I've ever done in my entire life."
articles.content: Zac Efron undergoes quite the transformation in The Iron Claw, putting on pounds of muscle to become professional wrestler Kevin Von Erich; he also dons a shaggy wig for the role and often wears tiny… [+3083 chars]
